text: Christine Gregoire (; née O'Grady; born March 24, 1947) is an American politician. She was the 22nd Governor of Washington from 2005 until 2013. She was a member for United States Democratic Party and the second female Governor of Washington. Gregoire chaired the National Governors Association for the 2010–2011 term."Gregoire to lead Governors Association meeting in D.C." , The News Tribune, February 28, 2011 She was born in Adrian, Michigan. ==References== Category:Governors of Washington (state) Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Michigan Category:Lawyers from Michigan Category:Lawyers from Washington (state)
title: Christine Gregoire
